title: How to Reset Your Password
content: To reset your password, click 'Forgot Password' on the login screen, enter your email, and follow the emailed instructions.

title: How to Change Your Email Address
content: Navigate to Settings > Account > Email. Enter your new email, confirm it, and complete verification.

title: Enabling Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
content: Go to Settings > Security > 2FA and choose SMS or authenticator app. Follow the setup steps to enable extra security.

title: How to Cancel Your Subscription
content: Visit Billing > Subscriptions and click 'Cancel Subscription'. Your access remains active until the end of the billing cycle.

title: Troubleshooting 500 Internal Server Error
content: A 500 error usually means a server issue. Try again later or check https://status.example.com for known outages.

title: Understanding Your Invoice
content: Each invoice lists services used, prorated amounts, and taxes. Visit Billing > Invoices to download details.

title: How to Upgrade Your Plan
content: In Billing > Plans, click 'Upgrade'. Choose your new plan, confirm changes, and billing will update on your next cycle.

title: How to Contact Support
content: Click 'Help' on any page or email support@example.com. Support is available 24/7 for paid users.

title: How to Download Your Data
content: Go to Settings > Privacy > Download Data. You’ll receive a link via email once your archive is ready.

title: Resetting 2FA When Locked Out
content: If you’ve lost access to your 2FA, contact support with ID verification to reset it.

title: How to Add Team Members
content: Admin users can add members via Settings > Team > Add Member. You’ll need their email address.

title: Inviting External Collaborators
content: Go to Projects > Share > Invite Collaborator. Enter their email and assign read/write permissions.

title: Supported Payment Methods
content: We accept Visa, MasterCard, AMEX, and PayPal. You can update your payment method in Billing > Payment Info.

title: How to View Login History
content: Visit Settings > Security > Login History. You’ll see login locations, IPs, and device details.

title: Enabling Dark Mode
content: In Settings > Appearance, switch to 'Dark Mode' for reduced eye strain and battery usage.

title: What Happens After Account Deletion
content: After deletion, your data is permanently removed within 7 days. You can recover it during that window by logging in again.

title: Getting Email Notifications
content: Manage notifications in Settings > Notifications. You can choose which events trigger an email alert.

title: Common Reasons for Login Failure
content: Check if your password is correct, 2FA is working, and if your account is locked. Reset options are available.

title: How to Reassign a Project Owner
content: In Project Settings > Permissions, select a new owner from your team and confirm the change.

title: How to Report a Bug
content: Use the in-app feedback form or email support@example.com with a clear description, steps to reproduce, and screenshots.
